review_text: My first reaction is very negative.  If the bowl is to be stored in the freezer in a plastic bag, why doesn't the bowl come in such a bag??My old automatic freezer, pre 1999, came with a very heavy duty bag for such storage.Maybe a gallon ziplock will work???
summary: why isn't plastic bag for preventing freezer burn provided
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
